slides.title: You've Been Nominated

content.headline: {{business_name}} Has Been Nominated
content.subhead: For this week's Featured Business Spotlight

slides.narration: Great news—{{business_name}} has been nominated for this week's Featured Business Spotlight. This is a real opportunity. Let me show you what featured businesses get.

slides.title: What Featured Businesses Get
slides.narration: Featured businesses get serious benefits. Top placement in the directory—the first thing people see. A feature story in local news. Spotlight on our social media to our entire audience. Five times the average visibility of standard listings. And a permanent 'Featured' badge on your profile—a trust signal that lasts.

slides.title: Featured Business Results

testimonial.quote: Our feature week brought more new customers than the previous 3 months combined.
testimonial.author: Featured Business Owner

slides.narration: The results speak for themselves. Featured businesses see an average four hundred eighty-seven percent increase in views during their feature week. Three hundred twelve percent more inquiries. And a lasting visibility boost of forty-five percent that continues after the feature ends. One owner told us their feature week brought more new customers than the previous three months combined.

slides.title: How It Works

content.headline: The Feature Process
content.note: Not everyone is selected—we feature businesses that serve the community well

slides.narration: Here's how it works. Submit your application—takes about five minutes. Our team reviews within twenty-four to forty-eight hours. If you're selected, we'll contact you for a brief interview. Then your feature goes live within a week. I'll be honest: not everyone is selected. We feature businesses that genuinely serve the community well. But you've been nominated, which means someone thought {{business_name}} qualifies.

slides.title: Application Preview

content.headline: We Just Need a Few Things

fields.field: How do you serve the community?

slides.narration: The application is simple. Tell us what makes your business special. How you serve the community. Upload a recent photo of your business or team. And let us know the best time to contact you. Five minutes total. We're not looking for perfect answers—we're looking for authentic businesses worth featuring.

slides.title: Apply Now

content.headline: Your Nomination Is Open
content.urgency: Featured spots fill quickly—apply this week
content.reassurance: Free to apply • No commitment • We'll follow up within 48 hours

slides.narration: Your nomination is open now. Featured spots fill quickly, so I'd recommend applying this week. Click 'Apply for Feature' to submit your application. It's free, there's no commitment, and we'll follow up within forty-eight hours. {{business_name}} has been nominated. The only question is whether you'll accept.
